segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Namaste sir, main investment advisor hun. Aapko ek great opportunity mili hai 50% return ke saath.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: 50% return? Yeh kaise possible hai? Market mein itna high return nahi milta.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Sir, yeh crypto investment hai. Hamare clients ko regular profit mil raha hai. Minimum 1 lakh invest karna hoga.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Crypto risky hai. Main thoda research kar leta hun.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Sir, yeh limited time offer hai. Aaj invest karein toh 100% guarantee hai profit ki.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Main abhi invest nahi kar sakta. Aapko koi document share kar sakte hain?
